text: looking for documentation (any) on the drag-n-drop email beta. thank you very much

Anyone knows if there is a way to define our own fields (to insert in a module). I want to custom a color field only with a specific set of colors. I have another way to do it (create some css classes with a for loop and choose the class indirectly in the module with given names and numeric values which shape the classe name). But if something already exists to create a color field with only a set of color...
Maybe not then :grimacing: Why even restrict it at that point?
Because I have created a color scheme with `color_variant` filter and only four basic colors. I want editor use only colors in that scheme.

I need to use jQuery 1.11 for a site I'm building in staging. However, changing it breaks the live site. I noticed that I can choose a domain to target, but my staging subdomain isn't currently populating in the dropdown. What is the recommended method for this? Should I setup my temp subdomain a 'redirect?'
temporarily add it to the staging site manually

I now have two client sites where Bing is shooting back a 403 Forbidden on reading the /sitemap.xml Sitemap. It works fine for Google. Robots.txt looks just fine. The "Fetch as Bingbot" tool also works and gives an OK status. I'm hoping someone else has run into this and can point me to whatever is causing this. Thanks!
